title: Maybe a League of Legends card game?
body:
It think it'd be super fun and wicked, I don't have many ideas on how they should do it but, they could include other stories in there, and expand on things that they aren't able to in League. Like the stories or characters of "Zhonya", "Rabaddon", "Youmuu" etc.

It'd also be really handy if they made the games short enough to fit in queue times
